item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: July 28, 2024 Today's Verse Luke 4:18–19 [18] “The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, because he has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to proclaim liberty to the captives and recovering of sight to the blind, to set at liberty those who are oppressed, [19] to proclaim the year of the Lord’s favor.” This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
